column5: Steps to be executed

column3: To check whether the user is able to search the bus with valid input in redbus app.

3. Select the date from calendar
4. Click on Search button.

column3: To check whether the user should not be able to search the bus with invalid input in redbus app.

column5: 2. Enter the city name in To field
3. Select the date from calendar
4. Click on Search button.

column5: 2. Enter the city name in To field
